'''Acolyte Kinnuq''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A robed acolyte working for Nemnok, the Acolyte is a faithful follower of the "god" below, leading his vast team of scribes and acolytes in perusing the scrolls and tomes brought by the Junvik people to the Barrows.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/)
|none            = 
|other           = * You can punch him in the gut, each of your companions will get a laugh from this.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/): He gives you a few pointers on how to get to Nemnok. Then you can punch him in the gut for being insufferable.

[Category:Drowned Barrows characters](/categoryDrownedBarrowsCharacters/)

'''Acolyte Kinnuq''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A robed acolyte working for Nemnok, the Acolyte is a faithful follower of the "god" below, leading his vast team of scribes and acolytes in perusing the scrolls and tomes brought by the Junvik people to the Barrows.
